package.name: Spori
package.shortDescription: Quickly play from Spotify using Siri on iOS 13

descriptionlist.description:
Quickly play from Spotify using Siri on iOS 13. This tweak will add "on Spotify" to the end of the text. Configure keywords in Preferences.

Instead of asking Siri "Play This Love by Taylor Swift on Spotify", you can just ask Siri "Play This Love by Taylor Swift"

Compatible with iOS 13+

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

changelog.change: -Quick update for adding additinal default blacklist keyword
